trend_summary: Across the series, a mainly farm-forest mosaic persists. Central cropland expands gradually, and minor linear settlement growth occurs along the southern highway, but built-up footprint stays limited. The most striking change is large-scale forest loss and browning on the southwestern hills in the last image. Overall, the area remains sparsely built and rural.
notable_changes: Incremental enlargement of rectangular crop fields in the central and northern sectors.
Minor infill and ribbon-style village growth along the main southâ€“north road.
Significant forest clearance or burn scar appearing on southwestern hills in the latest image.
Slight extension of secondary roads/track network supporting farm access.
